overview: Three remains the mode of choice in this second collection of erotic vignettes from Deeper.com. Mona discovers her husband's affair and forces Kenzie to show her why she's been selected in "Worth the Trouble". Liv's roommate Kuleana insists on coming too when she discovers Liv's secret on her way to a session with her dom in "Do It Yourself". Laney allows her husband to bring another woman Lena in as a fertility surrogate in "Come First". Finally, Oliver's jealousy of Avery's side hustle with Vanna is put in check when Avery ties him up and tests his resolve against their mutual seduction in "Another Person". Each group finds a new high in the union of Three
title: Three 2
